revisionDesc.change: updated value of idno element in TEI header
Annotate letter date, Eagle sketch, Ruggles, Jeff, and George

body.p: i did try to get some eagles that had that little peecepiece in but i could not i suppose they might be got at the office it was the day Andrew died that it was in we thought it was Ruggles it began with who in brooklyn but knows walt whitman even at the couch of the dying and sick soldier to comfort and relieve them
that is the content the last is walt is now in washington it was A short peecepiece but very good Jeffy had one paper he said he wanted it to send to some one maybeemaybe he can get some
